body_en:
The negative effect of sanctions inside Russia is not advertised by public figures, but is assessed by experts as [extremely negative in the long term](https://www.dw.com/en/yale-study-shows-sanctions-are-crippling-russias-economy/a-62623738)

The authorities seek to explain the decline in living standards to the audience through external pressure and injustice from unfriendly countries.
